amendment.description: To amend the definition of credit to exclude no interest credit instruments.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4146 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 4146 proposed by Senator Ensign to Amendment SA 3739. (consideration: CR S3973; text: CR S3973) To amend the definition of credit to exclude no interest credit instruments.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4146 proposed by Senator Ensign to Amendment SA 3739.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4146 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
